formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Funktion in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'QUEUE_WAITING_COUNT' =-
[Syntax] QUEUE_WAITING_COUNT(<queuename>)
[Synopsis] Count number of calls currently waiting in a queue
[Description] Returns the number of callers currently waiting in the specified queue.
